scripts.prepare: if [ ! -d "protobufs" ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/SteamDatabase/Protobufs.git protobufs; fi && if [ ! -d "SteamKit" ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit.git; fi && mv SteamKit/Resources/ProtobufGen protobuf_gen && mv SteamKit/Resources/SteamLanguage steam_language && rm -rf SteamKit
